amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that protecting middle-class families from the alternative minimum tax should be a higher priority for Congress in 2006 than extending a tax cut that does not expire until the end of 2008.

action.text: Amendment SA 2705 proposed by Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 2707.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2705 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 24. Record Vote Number: 9.
